Detailed Description

Class with some utility functions for converting File5 files into sqlite databases for analysis.

Currently static libraries to be used by other programs.

void File5_Sqlite::copyData ( sqlite3 *  db,
affx::File5_Tsv *  tsv5,
File5_Sqlite_Config &  config 
) [static]

Fill in an sqlite databse table with the data in the File5_Tsv table.

Parameters:
db - Open connection to the sqlite database data will be inserted
tsv5 - File5_Tsv pointer which will be read for data
config - Various configurations to insert the data like table name etc.

Use the column definitions in the File5 definition to create a table in sqlite database.

Parameters:
db - Open connection to the sqlite database where table will be created.
tsv5 - File5_Tsv pointer which will be read to create column definitions.
config - Various configurations to make the table like table name, and primary column name
